title: 820-3435-b no power
message:
No water damage history-  no sign of drop.

ppbus_g3h 8.22v
pp3v42_g3h 3.42v
ppvrtc 3.42v

pp5v_s5 AND pp3v3_s5 both missing. do i have a bad smc?

title: 820-3435-b no power
message:
"ppbus_g3h 8.22v"
So SMC doesn't properly talk with ISL6259.

Post SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_BATLOW_L, SMC_PM_G2_EN.
Check basic signals and voltages for U5000 (2 OF 2), page 35.

title: 820-3435-b no power
message:
SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_BATLOW_L, SMC_PM_G2_EN  all 0v.

no green light i test pin 9 of j9500 voltage fluctuating constantly between 0.3v to 3.3v

around u5000:
L5001 3.3v present
PP3V3_S5_AVREF_SMC 3.3v present
PP1V2_S5_SMC_VDDC 1.2v present

title: 820-3435-b no power
message:
All SMC_Txx signals with high level?
If yes, put good flux and reflow SMC.
If still the same issue, reball it.
As last option, change SMC; donor board, same model required.

title: 820-3435-b no power
message: smc_tXxxxx signals u mean with oscilloscope?

title: 820-3435-b no power
message:
NO, just DC voltage.
All 4 should be high...

title: 820-3435-b no power
message:
yes all good i reflow and green light AND fan spin.... power is the booting up chime --- but having wifi. i will test and report back..
thanks INFORMATICOS!!!
